page.title: 17Home-life of nine-year-olds.
page.content: My after-school activities are laying the table for tea and feeding the guinea pig.I watch television for one hour.I still have time to do my spelling and tables for school on a Thursday night. Before I go to bed I read a book. A treat is being able to watch television for an extra hour, and staying up until nine o'clock and going on holiday to Spain. My mum cooks our meals on the electric cooker.Everybody likes her food. On Sunday we have a roast dinner. My best part is roast beef and chicken. My favourite meal is chips, beans and sausages. I do not like mince, peas or carrots. They are horrid. I do not like apple pie much and I am not too keen on custard.Pets are lovely things to have. I have three fish, one hamster and lots of bees. {St. Mary's.}
